source.name: Password Checkup
source.instructions:
Julie is creating a new account on yahoo. Her username will be mynameisjulie.

Which of these passwords would be the strongest password?

answers.answer: JuLiE, it has mixed cases and is easy to remember because it is her name.
Iali2Yrn, which is her passphrase for "I am logging in to Yahoo right now"
yAHOO!, because it does not contain her name but will be easy to remember and has mixed cases.
toasty, which is her passphrase for "this old account sends to yahoo"

source.name: Identifying Insecurity
source.instructions: Select the correct label from the drop-down menu.
source.text:
The <<<http://>>> prefix means a website may **not** be secure and users should be cautious of entering payment information on the site. 

The <<<https://>>> prefix means a website **is** secure, and a user can enter payment and personal information as long as they trust the company that owns the website.
